TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider extends System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider

summary.span: 以用戶端應用程式服務啟用表單驗證。

span.span: Enables forms authentication with client application services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用用戶端應用程式服務來使用表單驗證驗證使用者。You can use client application services to validate users by using forms authentication. 若要啟用表單驗證，您可以設定您的應用程式使用類別。To enable forms authentication, you configure your application to use the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 完成設定後，您可以驗證使用者，藉由呼叫`static`方法，它會在內部呼叫方法。After configuration, you can validate users by calling the `static` method, which internally calls the method. 表單驗證會要求使用者指定其認證，透過您的應用程式所提供的登入控制項。Forms authentication requires that the user specify their credentials through login controls provided by your application. 您可以擷取認證，並將其傳遞給方法。You can retrieve the credentials and pass them to the method. 您也可以傳遞空字串或`null`使用認證提供者。You can also pass in empty strings or `null` to use a credentials provider. 認證提供者是實作您的應用程式組態檔中指定。A credentials provider is an implementation specified in your application configuration file. 您通常會實作方法來顯示登入 對話方塊，並傳回填入物件。You will typically implement the method to display a login dialog box and return a populated object. 您可透過使用認證提供者在多個應用程式之間分享單一登入對話方塊。Using a credentials provider enables you to share a single login dialog box among multiple applications. 方法會驗證使用者登入服務以透過屬性。The method authenticates users through the login service indicated by the property. 值屬性通常擷取自應用程式組態檔，以及其他組態值。The value of the property is typically retrieved from the application configuration file along with other configuration values. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 如果已成功驗證使用者時，服務提供者設定`static`屬性，以新物件，其中包含新含有使用者資訊的物件。If the user is successfully authenticated, the service provider sets the `static` property to a new object that contains a new object that contains the user information. 如果已針對您的應用程式中，您可以使用從角色服務擷取使用者角色資訊的物件。If a is configured for your application, you can use the object to retrieve user role information from the roles service. 您可以擷取目前的參考執行個體透過`static`屬性。You can retrieve a reference to the current instance through the `static` property. 您可以使用成員資格提供者參考來呼叫直接方法。You can use the membership provider reference to call the method directly. 此外，您必須呼叫的成員資格提供者參考方法，就無法用於基底類別。Additionally, you will need the membership provider reference to call the method, which is not available in the base class. 您無法使用類別來建立、 刪除或修改成員資格資訊。You cannot use the class to create, delete, or modify membership information. 若要建立、 刪除或修改的使用者，您必須變更登入服務，在伺服器上的組態。To create, delete, or modify users, you must change the configuration of the login service on the server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法來驗證使用者使用實作。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to validate the user by using an implementation. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#306](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#306)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#306](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#306)]

summary.span: 將提供者初始化。

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]擴充性模型呼叫方法來初始化使用應用程式組態檔中的資訊。The [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] extensibility model calls the method to initialize the using information in your application configuration file. 這個方法會辨識下列的驗證服務的組態屬性：This method recognizes the following authentication service configuration attributes: - `name` - `description` - `savePasswordHashLocally` - `credentialsProvider` - `connectionStringName` - `serviceUri` 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void Logout ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Logout() cil managed
Public Sub Logout ()
public: void Logout();
member this.Logout : unit -> unit

summary.span: 登出使用者。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會清除 cookie 快取中的所有驗證 cookie，並會重設`static`屬性設物件，包含目前。The method clears all authentication cookies from the cookie cache and resets the `static` property to a object that contains the current . 呼叫這個方法之後，目前的使用者不再會驗證用戶端應用程式服務。After you call this method, the current user is no longer authenticated for client application services. 這表示您無法擷取角色透過類別和透過 設定類別。This means that you cannot retrieve roles through the class and settings through the class. 不過，因為使用者可能會有有效的 Windows 身分識別，您可能仍會收到`true`從程式碼，如下所示的值： `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.IsAuthenticated`。However, because the user might have a valid Windows identity, you might still receive a `true` value from code such as the following: `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.IsAuthenticated`. 若要判斷使用者是否已驗證的用戶端應用程式服務，確認屬性值透過擷取`static`屬性是參考。To determine whether the user is authenticated for client application services, confirm that the property value of the retrieved through the `static` property is a reference. 然後，請檢查屬性。Then, check the property. 若要重新驗證目前的使用者，呼叫方法或`static`方法。To reauthenticate the current user, call the method or the `static` method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法來登出使用者。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to log out the user. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#070](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Form1.cs#070)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#070](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Form1.vb#070)]

exception.span: 屬性值為 ，且成員資格提供者無法存取驗證服務。

span.span: The property value is and the membership provider is unable to access the authentication service.

summary.span: 取得或設定驗證服務的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the URI of the authentication service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定屬性儲存在您的應用程式程式碼，但是通常會設定應用程式組態檔中的值。You can set the property in your application code, but you will typically set the value in your application configuration file. 這可讓您不需要重新編譯您的程式碼變更的服務位置。This enables you to change the service location without recompiling your code. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式設定驗證服務位置。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to programmatically set the authentication service location. 當您以程式設計方式設定服務位置時，您必須指定完整服務最後一定會使用 「 Authentication_JSON_AppService.axd"的 URI。When you set the service location programmatically, you must specify the complete service URI, which will always end with "Authentication_JSON_AppService.axd". [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#301](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#301)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#301](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#301)]

exception.span: 當取得這個屬性時，在應用程式組態檔中找不到服務 URI，且這個屬性先前並未設定過。

span.span: When getting this property, no service URI was found in the application configuration file, and this property has not been previously set.

member this.UserValidated : EventHandler<System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.UserValidatedEventArgs>

summary.span: 在驗證使用者時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user is validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在成功驗證使用者之後，才會發生此事件。This event occurs only after the user is successfully validated. 若要更新您的應用程式，以反映目前的使用者，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to update your application to reflect the current user. 例如，您可以使用屬性以您的應用程式使用者介面 (UI) 中顯示的使用者名稱。For example, you can use the property to display the user name in your application user interface (UI). 您可以藉由呼叫以無訊息方式重新驗證使用者方法。You can silently revalidate users by calling the method. 因此，您應該避免使用事件，以顯示具侵入性的 UI。Therefore, you should avoid using the event to display intrusive UI. 例如，您不應該使用事件，以顯示 [歡迎使用] 對話方塊。For example, you should not use the event to display a welcome dialog box. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個事件表單的標題列中顯示的使用者名稱。The following example code demonstrates how to use this event to display the user name in the title bar of a form. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#305](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#305)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#305](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#305)]

summary.span: 使用指定的認證來驗證使用者。

The password of the user to authenticate.

span.span: Authenticates a user by using the specified user name and password.

returns.span: 如果使用者已驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user was authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用用戶端應用程式服務來使用表單驗證驗證使用者。You can use client application services to validate users by using forms authentication. 若要驗證使用者，您通常都會呼叫`static`方法，它會在內部呼叫方法。To validate users, you will typically call the `static` method, which internally calls the method. 或者，您可以直接呼叫這個方法，如範例 > 一節中所示。Alternatively, you can call this method directly, as shown in the Example section. 表單驗證會要求使用者指定其認證，透過您的應用程式所提供的登入控制項。Forms authentication requires that the user specify their credentials through login controls provided by your application. 您可以擷取認證，並將其傳遞給方法。You can retrieve the credentials and pass them to the method. 您也可以傳遞空字串或`null`使用認證提供者。You can also pass in empty strings or `null` to use a credentials provider. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：使用用戶端應用程式服務實作使用者登入](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-implement-user-login-with-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Implement User Login with Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-implement-user-login-with-client-application-services.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法來驗證使用者使用實作。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to validate the user by using an implementation. 這個範例需要您設定您的應用程式使用的認證提供者。This example requires that you to configure your application to use a credentials provider. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#306](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#306)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#306](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#306)]

exception.span: 屬性值為 ，且成員資格提供者無法存取驗證服務。

span.span: The property value is and the membership provider is unable to access the authentication service.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ValidateUser (string username, string password, bool rememberMe);

Public Function ValidateUser (username As String, password As String, rememberMe As Boolean) As Boolean
public: bool ValidateUser(System::String ^ username, System::String ^ password, bool rememberMe);
override this.ValidateUser : string * string * bool -> bool

span.span: The name of the user to authenticate.
The password of the user to authenticate.

param.name: rememberMe
param.span: 如果將密碼的雜湊儲存在本機資料快取中，以供離線使用和使用者驗證 Cookie 過期時自動重新驗證，則為 ；如果停用離線登入或在 Cookie 過期時要求使用者重新驗證，則為 。

span.span: to store a hash of the password in the local data cache for offline use and for automatic reauthentication when the user authentication cookie expires; to disable offline login or to require users to reauthenticate when the cookie expires.

summary.span: 使用指定的使用者名稱和密碼來驗證使用者，並選擇性地將密碼的雜湊儲存在本機資料快取中。

span.span: Authenticates a user by using the specified user name and password, optionally storing a hash of the password in the local data cache.

returns.span: 如果使用者已驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user was authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用用戶端應用程式服務來使用表單驗證驗證使用者。You can use client application services to validate users by using forms authentication. 若要驗證使用者，您通常都會呼叫`static`方法，它會在內部呼叫方法。To validate users, you will typically call the `static` method, which internally calls the method. 或者，您可以呼叫直接方法。Alternatively, you can call the method directly. 您可以呼叫這個多載來傳入`rememberMe`值除了`username`和`password`值。You can call this overload to pass in a `rememberMe` value in addition to the `username` and `password` values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法來驗證使用者，在您的應用程式程式碼中使用登入控制項。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to validate the user by using login controls in your application code. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`usernameTextBox`，則控制項，名為`passwordTextBox`，和控制項，名為`rememberMeCheckBox`。This example requires a control named `usernameTextBox`, a control named `passwordTextBox`, and a control named `rememberMeCheckBox`. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#307](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#307)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#307](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#307)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用用戶端應用程式服務來使用表單驗證驗證使用者。You can use client application services to validate users by using forms authentication. 若要驗證使用者，您通常都會呼叫`static`方法，它會在內部呼叫方法。To validate users, you will typically call the `static` method, which internally calls the method. 或者，您可以呼叫直接方法。Alternatively, you can call the method directly. 您可以呼叫這個多載來存取驗證服務所指定的位置在`serviceUri`參數。You can call this overload to access an authentication service at the location specified by the `serviceUri` parameter. 使用這個多載可以設定替代屬性，並呼叫多載。Using this overload is an alternative to setting the property and calling the overload. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用此方法來驗證使用者透過驗證服務在指定的位置。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to validate the user through an authentication service at a specified location. 從您的應用程式程式碼中的登入控制項，會擷取使用者認證。The user credentials are retrieved from login controls in your application code. 這個範例需要控制項，名為`usernameTextBox`並控制項，名為`passwordTextBox`。This example requires a control named `usernameTextBox` and a control named `passwordTextBox`. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#308](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#308)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#308](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#308)]
